# requirements.txt for pip install

# User's minimal environment for FDS

numpy<2
matplotlib
pandas
scipy
seaborn
pygments
ipython
# cantera>=3.1 pulls ruamel.yaml>=0.19 which requires ruamel.yaml.clibz (Python.h)
cantera<3.1
ruamel.yaml<0.19
pyfdstools
bibtexautocomplete

# Local utility packages (imports fdsplotlib)
-e ../Utilities/Python
